Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Interfaces
  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Exceptions
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Constructors
  • Deprecated Interfaces 
    Interface and Description
    org.jasig.cas.authentication.handler.AuthenticationHandler
    In favor of AuthenticationHandler.
    org.jasig.cas.authentication.principal.Credentials
    This component has been renamed to Credential in CAS 4.0.
    org.jasig.cas.authentication.handler.NamedAuthenticationHandler
    The CAS 4.0 AuthenticationHandler provides support for named handlers, which makes this interface redundant.
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    org.jasig.cas.extension.clearpass.CacheCredentialsMetaDataPopulator
    As of 4.1, use CacheCredentialsMetaDataPopulator instead.
    org.jasig.cas.support.saml.util.CasHTTPSOAP11Encoder
    As of 4.1, the class name is abbreviated in a way that is not per camel-casing standards and will be renamed in the future.
    org.jasig.cas.extension.clearpass.ClearPassController
    As of 4.1, use CacheCredentialsMetaDataPopulator instead.
    org.jasig.cas.web.DelegateController
    As of 4.1, the class is required to note its abstractness in the name and will be renamed in the future.
    org.jasig.cas.extension.clearpass.EhcacheBackedMap
    As of 4.1, use CacheCredentialsMetaDataPopulator instead.
    org.jasig.cas.extension.clearpass.EncryptedMapDecorator
    As of 4.1, use CacheCredentialsMetaDataPopulator instead.
    org.jasig.cas.util.JBossCacheFactoryBean
    As of 4.1 the Jboss cache integration module is no longer supported. Please use other means of confguring your distributed ticket registry, such as ehcache or memcached integrations with CAS.
    org.jasig.cas.ticket.registry.JBossCacheTicketRegistry
    As of 4.1 the Jboss cache integration module is no longer supported. Please use other means of configuring your distributed ticket registry, such as ehcache or memcached integrations with CAS.

    Implementation of TicketRegistry that is backed by a JBoss TreeCache.
    org.jasig.cas.support.spnego.authentication.handler.support.JCIFSConfig
    As of 4.1, the class name is abbreviated in a way that is not per camel-casing standards and will be renamed in the future.
    org.jasig.cas.support.spnego.authentication.handler.support.JCIFSSpnegoAuthenticationHandler
    As of 4.1, the class name is abbreviated in a way that is not per camel-casing standards and will be renamed in the future.
    org.jasig.cas.persondir.LdapPersonAttributeDao
    As of 4.1. Use org.jasig.services.persondir.support.ldap.LdaptivePersonAttributeDao. Person directory IPersonAttribute implementation that queries an LDAP directory with ldaptive components to populate person attributes.
    org.jasig.cas.services.RegisteredServiceImpl
    As for 4.1. Consider using RegexRegisteredService instead. Mutable registered service that uses Ant path patterns for service matching.
    org.jasig.cas.remoting.server.RemoteCentralAuthenticationService
    As of 4.1. No longer required. The default implementation can be used to delegate calls to the service layer from WS.
    org.jasig.cas.integration.restlet.TicketGrantingTicketResource
    As of 4.1. Use the TicketResource implementation from cas-server-support-rest module
    org.jasig.cas.extension.clearpass.TicketRegistryDecorator
    As of 4.1, use CacheCredentialsMetaDataPopulator instead.
    org.jasig.cas.integration.restlet.TicketResource
    Use TicketsResource implementation from cas-server-support-rest module
    org.jasig.cas.authentication.support.UpnSearchEntryResolver
    As of 4.1, this component is no longer required. Ldaptive's own SearchEntryResolver now supports all the functionality that is presented by this class through various settings and filter parameters. This class is scheduled to be removed in future CAS versions. Ldaptive extension component for Active Directory that supports querying for an entry by User Principal Name (UPN). This component only provides meaningful results when used on a bound connection; therefore it cannot be used with ldaptive support for the AD FastBind operation, org.ldaptive.ad.extended.FastBindOperation.

    Since the UPN is abstracted from the location of an entry in the directory, subtree searching is required to locate an entry. The UpnSearchEntryResolver.setBaseDn(String) property must be set to the lowest common branch where all authenticated users are located, commonly dc=example,dc=org or OU=Users,dc=example,dc=org.
  • Deprecated Exceptions 
    Exceptions and Description
    org.jasig.cas.authentication.handler.AuthenticationException
    As of 4.1, the class is required to note its abstractness in the name and will be renamed in the future.
    org.jasig.cas.ticket.TicketException
    As of 4.1, the class is required to note its abstractness in the name and will be renamed in the future.
    org.jasig.cas.ticket.TicketValidationException
    As of 4.1, the class is required to note its abstractness in the name and will be renamed in the future.
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    org.jasig.cas.support.spnego.authentication.handler.support.JCIFSSpnegoAuthenticationHandler.getSimplePrincipal(String, boolean)
    As of 4.1. Use JCIFSSpnegoAuthenticationHandler.getPrincipal(String, boolean) Gets the simple principal from the given name.
    org.jasig.cas.support.saml.web.support.GoogleAccountsArgumentExtractor.setAlternateUsername(String)
    As of 4.1. The behavior is controlled by the service registry instead. Sets an alternate username to send to Google (i.e. fully qualified email address). Relies on an appropriate attribute available for the user.

    Note that this is optional and the default is to use the normal identifier.
    org.jasig.cas.web.flow.SendTicketGrantingTicketAction.setCentralAuthenticationService(CentralAuthenticationService)
    As of 4.1, use constructors instead.
    org.jasig.cas.logout.LogoutManagerImpl.setIssueAsynchronousCallbacks(boolean)
    As of 4.1. Use LogoutManagerImpl.setAsynchronous(boolean) instead
    org.jasig.cas.ticket.registry.support.DefaultTicketRegistryCleaner.setLock(LockingStrategy)
    As of 4.1. Consider using constructors instead.
    org.jasig.cas.ticket.registry.support.DefaultTicketRegistryCleaner.setLogoutManager(LogoutManager)
    As of 4.1. Consider using constructors instead.
    org.jasig.cas.ticket.registry.support.DefaultTicketRegistryCleaner.setLogUserOutOfServices(boolean)
    As of 4.1, single signout callbacks are entirely controlled by the LogoutManager.
    org.jasig.cas.ticket.support.TicketGrantingTicketExpirationPolicy.setMaxTimeToLiveInMilliSeconds(long)
    As of 4.1. Set max time to live in milli seconds.
    org.jasig.cas.ticket.support.TicketGrantingTicketExpirationPolicy.setMaxTimeToLiveInSeconds(long)
    As of 4.1. Convenient virtual property setter to set time in seconds.
    org.jasig.cas.CentralAuthenticationServiceImpl.setPersistentIdGenerator(PersistentIdGenerator)
    Sets persistent id generator.
    org.jasig.cas.support.saml.web.support.GoogleAccountsArgumentExtractor.setPrivateKey(PrivateKey)
    As of 4.1. Use Ctors instead.
    org.jasig.cas.support.saml.web.support.GoogleAccountsArgumentExtractor.setPublicKey(PublicKey)
    As of 4.1. Use Ctors instead.
    org.jasig.cas.authentication.handler.support.HttpBasedServiceCredentialsAuthenticationHandler.setRequireSecure(boolean)
    As of 4.1. Endpoint security is handled by service proxy policies

    Set whether a secure url is required or not.
    org.jasig.cas.authentication.principal.ShibbolethCompatiblePersistentIdGenerator.setSalt(String)
    As of 4.1. Sets salt.
    org.jasig.cas.web.flow.SendTicketGrantingTicketAction.setServicesManager(ServicesManager)
    As of 4.1, use constructors instead.
    org.jasig.cas.ticket.registry.MemCacheTicketRegistry.setSynchronizeUpdatesToRegistry(boolean)
    As of version 3.5, this operation has no effect since async writes can cause registry consistency issues.
    org.jasig.cas.web.flow.SendTicketGrantingTicketAction.setTicketGrantingTicketCookieGenerator(CookieRetrievingCookieGenerator)
    As of 4.1, use constructors instead.
    org.jasig.cas.ticket.registry.support.DefaultTicketRegistryCleaner.setTicketRegistry(TicketRegistry)
    As of 4.1. Consider using constructors instead.
    org.jasig.cas.web.flow.AuthenticationViaFormAction.setTicketRegistry(TicketRegistry)
    As of 4.1
    org.jasig.cas.ticket.support.TicketGrantingTicketExpirationPolicy.setTimeToKillInMilliSeconds(long)
    As of 4.1. Sets time to kill in milli seconds.
    org.jasig.cas.ticket.support.TicketGrantingTicketExpirationPolicy.setTimeToKillInSeconds(long)
    As of 4.1.
  • Deprecated Constructors 
    Constructor and Description
    org.jasig.cas.services.DefaultServicesManagerImpl(ServiceRegistryDao, List)

    As of 4.1. Use DefaultServicesManagerImpl.DefaultServicesManagerImpl(ServiceRegistryDao) instead. The defaultAttributes parameter is no longer used. Attributes are configured per service definition in the services registry. See RegisteredService.getAttributeReleasePolicy() for more details.
    org.jasig.cas.ticket.registry.support.kryo.KryoTranscoder(int)
    Creates a Kryo-based transcoder.
    org.jasig.cas.ticket.registry.MemCacheTicketRegistry(long, long, String[])
    This has been deprecated
    org.jasig.cas.services.RegisteredServiceImpl()
    As of 4.1. Consider using regex patterns instead via RegexRegisteredService. Instantiates a new registered service.
    org.jasig.cas.ticket.support.TicketGrantingTicketExpirationPolicy()
    As of 4.1. Instantiates a new Ticket granting ticket expiration policy.
    org.jasig.cas.audit.spi.TicketOrCredentialPrincipalResolver(TicketRegistry)
    As of 4.1 access to the registry is no longer relevant Consider using alternative constructors instead.
